title: My pixel 3's USB-C to Jack adaptator doesn't work
content:
Hello,
I recently bought a Google Pixel 3.
I played music on my USB C earphones (got them when I bought the phone) and it was fine until they stopped working with no reason.
So, I bought a bluetooth JBL (works fine too) but, recently, I had a ear problem and I can't put my JBL on. So, i bought regular earphones (Sony's) and when I plug them on the USBC/Jack adaptator, they doesn't work.
